xwikidoc.content: <gauravsaini03> has joined #phenotips 02:37 <ruthgrace> has quit 02:38 <sdumitriu> is now known as <sdumitriu_[Away]> 05:55 <tweety098> has quit 07:40 <tweety098> has quit 07:51 <tweety098> has quit 08:48 <tweety098> has quit 09:23 <tweety098> has quit 10:30 <sdumitriu> has joined #phenotips 10:37 <allasm> has joined #phenotips 10:39 <sdumitriu> Hey allasm 10:41 <akats> has joined #phenotips 10:42 <sdumitriu1> has joined #phenotips 10:44 <sdumitriu> has quit 10:46 <tweety098> has quit 10:47 <sdumitriu1> has quit 10:52 <ruthgrace> has quit 10:59 <gauravsaini03> has quit 11:34 <tweety098> has quit 11:47 <tweety098> has quit 12:09 <shalini479> has quit 12:26 <ruthgrace> has quit 12:54 <tweety098> has quit 13:04 <SayAsh_> has joined #phenotips 13:07 <tweety098> has quit 13:24 <ruthgrace> has quit 13:24 <tweety098> has quit 13:55 <SayAsh_> has quit 13:56 <SayAsh> has joined #phenotips 14:54 <SayAsh> has quit 15:22 <aw1231> has joined #phenotips 15:42 <aw1231> sdumitiru_[Away]: I am unsure how to continue to work on my application. It seems like most of the work has been done, and the work that is requested is nearly impossible. I am considering withdrawing. 16:01 <sdumitriu_[Away]> is now known as <sdumitriu> 16:01 <sdumitriu> Hey aw1231 16:01 <sdumitriu> Why do you say it's nearly impossible? 16:13 <akats> sdumitriu: Would you like to see a magic trick when you have some free time? And by magic trick, I mean some ridiculous code. 16:20 <nclandrei> has joined #phenotips 16:20 <nclandrei> hi everyone ! 16:21 <sdumitriu> Hi nclandrei 16:28 <nclandrei> how are things going? 16:28 <nclandrei> because I will send you a more detailed draft tonight or tomorrow, currently working on it! 16:28 <sdumitriu> Almost ready for a new release 16:31 <nclandrei> ooh, good news 16:32 <nclandrei> congrats! 16:43 <nclandrei> if everything happens, I am here, just ping me :D 16:48 <akats> sdumitriu: Which http client do we use? I've asked you before, but I think I misheard you, because I have HTTPD written down, which is a server. 16:49 <sdumitriu> org.apache.httpcomponents:httpclient 16:49 <akats> Thank you 17:03 <akats> https://github.com/soLEED/misc/blob/master/src/ethnicityParser.java 17:19 <nclandrei_> has joined #phenotips 17:19 <nclandrei_> sorry for that, back again 17:20 <akats> I don't completely understand the scoring in the debug output, but my guess is that the strength of the default boost is not enough. Log10 of the population brings down a difference of 8 million to 40 points. 17:20 <sdumitriu> Yes, was just looking at that 17:22 <akats> Actually currently it's not log10 17:22 <akats> its log10 which is then brought up to the power of 3 17:23 <nclandrei> has quit 17:36 <sdumitriu> akats: Actually it's almost normal for Asante to be so high 17:36 <sdumitriu> They have roughly the same population as ashkenazi 17:38 <akats> It still needs to be fixed, or no? 17:38 <sdumitriu> Hold on 18:01 <tweety098> has quit 18:25 <aw1231> has quit 18:38 <nclandrei_> has quit 18:39 <nclandrei> has joined #phenotips 18:39 <mcupak> has quit 19:21 <Shubham> has quit 19:49 <nclandrei> yeey, I am very happy, just finished the proposal (-: 19:50 <nclandrei> sdumitriu, should I send it to you on email? 19:51 <sdumitriu> Submit it through Melange 19:51 <nclandrei> okay, I shall do that 19:51 <nclandrei> so I only have to put it there? 19:51 <sdumitriu> Yes 19:51 <nclandrei> okay, thank you! 19:59 <Shubham> has quit 20:01 <nclandrei> I can go to sleep now! (-: thank you again 20:01 <nclandrei> have a good night and easy work 20:05 <nclandrei> has quit 20:13 <Shubham> has quit 20:33 <Shubham> has quit 20:57 <sdumitriu> is now known as <sdumitriu_[Away]> 21:12 <ruthgrace> has quit 21:53 <tweety098> has quit 22:30 <ruthgrace> has quit
